question: Is there a minimum stay?
answer: Yes, there is a 3 night minimum for all.

question: What time is check-in? What time is check-out?
answer: Thursday check-in starts at 3pm and ends at 9pm. Friday & Saturday check-in starts at 9 am and ends at 9pm. Check-out is 11am.

question: How far are you from the festival?
answer: Festival grounds is located less than 2 miles from the Festival venue

question: How do I get to the festival?
answer: Most of our guests purchase our weekend shuttle Pass. This will give you roundtrip rides all weekend long. Finish one hour after the festival ends. Uber and Taxis are also available in the area although surge pricing is known to get pretty expensive.

question: Can I purchase your “Shuttle Pass” when I arrive to festival campgrounds?
answer: When you arrive please ask to purchase the shuttle pass.

question: Does the official festival shuttle pass work at festival campgrounds?
answer: No, the official festival shuttle does not stop at festival campgrounds. The official festival shuttle pass is not valid for use on the festival campgrounds shuttles.

question: Where do I park my car?
answer: We have a general car parking lot

question: What type of campsites does festival campgrounds offer?
answer: Festival Campgrounds offers bring your own tent, We also offer “Luxury Tents” as unfurnished or fully furnished. You can find all of the details here on our website.

question: How do I charge my cell phone and other electronics?
answer: We have selected electrical outlets that you will have access to.

question: Do you offer refunds if I need to cancel my reservation?
answer: Sorry, we do not offer refunds on reservations.

question: Can I bring my own food & drinks?
answer: Yes, you may bring your own food and drinks

question: Do you have wi-fi?
answer: We do not have public wi-fi at festival campgrounds although cell service is generally pretty good.

question: Can I bring my pet?
answer: Sorry, no pets are allowed (with the exception of service animals).

question: Do you have bathrooms and showers?
answer: Yes, we have flushable toilets and shower facilities. Included with the rate.

question: What if I need to check-in outside of your registration office hours?
answer: If you must arrive to festival campgrounds  outside of our normal check-in office hours (we close up around 11pm each night) then you will be placed in a temporary site upon arrival. You will then be able to check-in and be placed in your official campsite when our registration opens for the day.

question: Can I place an EZ-Up style canopy over my tent for shade?
answer: Yes, as long as it fits within your campsite plot.

question: Can I bring a portable generator for my campsite?
answer: No portable generators are allowed due to fire permits.

question: Can I start a campfire?
answer: No open flames are allowed at Festival Campgrounds. This includes charcoal BBQ’s.

question: I am new to camping, can someone help me set up my tent?
answer: Most likely, yes! Just ask us when you arrive and we will do our best to lend a helping hand.
